name: Shear Perfection
description:
Controls: mouse only - no clicking

Shaving is hard! Follow the instructions in the bottom-left! Your old razor isn't the best, so try to keep it in check!

Pigs or cows I don't like to keep
Horses neither, I only like sheep
I love to count them to fall asleep
When they're turned into kebabs I gently weep

Made in 48 hours for the Spring Jam 2021
